name: Spicy Mango Chutney Recipe. Vegan
description: Easy Spicy mango chutney. Indian mango chutney to use as a condiment or to make into mango curry. Makes about a 2/3 cup
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon organic high fat oil (I used organic canola. coconut would work too)
1  diced champagne mango  (or large mango preferably very ripe)
1/2 teaspoon red chili flakes or 1 broken dry red chili (adjust to taste)
2 Tablespoons cider vinegar or white vinegar
2 Tablespoon Raw sugar or equivalent jaggery or packed brown sugar or other sweetener. (adjust to taste less or more)

recipeInstructions.text: In a large non stick or non-reactive pot, add oil and heat on low, swirl to spread on the bottom.
recipeInstructions.name: In a large non stick or non-reactive pot, add oil and heat on low, swirl to spread on the bottom.

recipeInstructions.text: Add all ingredients and mix well.
recipeInstructions.name: Add all ingredients and mix well.

recipeInstructions.text: Cook on medium-low heat and bring to a rolling boil, reduce heat to low and simmer until thick, about 25 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Cook on medium-low heat and bring to a rolling boil, reduce heat to low and simmer until thick, about 25 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Stir frequently to keep from sticking.
recipeInstructions.name: Stir frequently to keep from sticking.

recipeInstructions.text: Taste for sweet, sour, spice levels, adjust spices, mix well and take off heat after another minute.
